attributes.action: Hide Speed Camera's; remove unnecessary camera's and traffic controls.
attributes.additional_details:
Hide speed cameras which are proven to catch people out and do not use warning signs, yet at the same time remove unnecessary cameras, which do not help with any traffic problems, and traffic block etc; replace with a more helpful item or a scheme to prevent speeding or dangerous driving and so forth.

This could significantly increase the number of drivers caught, who often slow down prior to the camera and speed up afterwards. by also considering where other traffic aids are it could easily improve the traffic management systems in the UK.
